# Developers

## Core Team

* **[Jiadong Mao](https://github.com/jdongmao)** - *Lead Developer, Maintainer*
  * Contributes to the R implementation of DIVAS and mathematical modeling.

* **[Yinuo Sun](https://github.com/ByronSyun)** - *Package Maintainer*
  * Maintains the R package and develops documentation and infrastructure.

## Contributors

* **John Prothero** - *Author*
  * Lead author of the DIVAS methodology paper.

* **Eric F. Lock** - *Author*
  * Contributing author of the DIVAS methodology.

* **J.S. Marron** - *Author*
  * Contributing author of the DIVAS methodology.

## Join the Team

We're always looking for contributors who can help improve the DIVAS package. If you're interested in contributing, check out our [contributing guidelines](contributing.html) or [get in touch with the team](https://github.com/ByronSyun/DIVAS_Develop/issues).
